reg_info.act_under: Livestock Identification Act   Loi sur l’identification du bétail

content.content: 1. The fee payable, (a) on an application for allotment of a brand for a period of three years is $50; (b) on an application for a renewal of an allotment of a brand for a period of three years is $50; (c) on an application for a change in the record of a brand is $50; and (d) on every transfer of a recorded brand is $50. O. Reg. 700/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The fee payable,

(a) on an application for allotment of a brand for a period of three years is $50;

(b) on an application for a renewal of an allotment of a brand for a period of three years is $50;

(c) on an application for a change in the record of a brand is $50; and

(d) on every transfer of a recorded brand is $50. O. Reg. 700/94, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 700/94, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 700/94, s. 2.
